pageProps.content:
# Manchurian

~2 cups
serves 4

## Ingredients

* 2tsp garlic powder
* 1/4 cup sugar
* 1/4 cup cornstarch (Tb?)
* 1 cup water
* 1/4 cup soy sauce
* 1/8 cup oyster sauce
* 1/8 cup vinegar

## Method


## Notes

good with chicken
